text: Aey ehal-e-kitab! Bil yaqeen humara rasool tumharay pass rasoolon ki aamad kay aik waqfay kay baad aa phoncha hai. Jo tumharay liye saaf saaf biyan ker raha hai takay tumhari yeh baat na reh jaye kay humaray pass to koi bhalaee buraee sunaney wala aaya hi nahi pus abb to yaqeenan khushkhabri sunaney wala aur aagah kerney wala aa phoncha aur Allah Taalaa her cheez per qadir hai
